name: Fast Coding
description:
Fast Coding provides support for common capabilities used in development to make coding efficient.
  • Mock Json: Java Bean convert to JSON(Support generic type). Place the cursor on the [class or method name] and press the shortcut alt + insert(at Windows) / ctrl + enter(at Mac), then click [Mock Json]
  • Process Killer: kill procss by port(Currently only Windows is supported)

You can access the source code.

Usage

Mock Json
